fullDescription.intro: Pads the layer input with zeros in three dimensions. Corresponds to the Keras Zero-Padding 3D Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
A tuple of two integers. How many zeros to add at the beginning and at the end of the first spatial dimension.
A tuple of two integers. How many zeros to add at the beginning and at the end of the second spatial dimension.
A tuple of two integers. How many zeros to add at the beginning and at the end of the third spatial dimension.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Zero-Padding 3D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Zero-Padding 3D layer.
